description: Display categorized list of available home workout routines
steps: Access workout library from main menu
View workout categories (strength, cardio, yoga, etc.)
Browse workouts within each category
View workout preview with duration and difficulty
Select a workout to view details

description: Track workout completion, sets, reps, and duration with visual progress indicators and statistics
steps: Create active workout session screen
Implement timer for duration tracking
Add inputs for sets and reps logging
Add 'Complete Workout' functionality
Store workout history in backend
Display progress indicators/statistics

description: Implement a workout history screen to view past completed workouts and logs
steps: Add GET /api/workout-logs endpoint to backend/server.ts filtering by user_id
Create new HistoryScreen component in expo/app/(tabs)/history.tsx
Add getWorkoutLogs method to expo/services/api.ts

description: Develop a web-based admin dashboard to manage workouts, exercises, and categories
steps: Initialize React Router in vitereact/src/App.tsx
Create CRUD forms for Workouts and Exercises in vitereact/src/components
Connect vitereact frontend to backend/server.ts API endpoints

description: Embed video playback for exercises within the active workout screen
steps: Install expo-av or similar video package in expo/
Update ActiveWorkoutScreen in expo/app/workout/[id].tsx to render video player
Bind video_url from the 'exercises' table to the player component
errorMessage: Agent completed but feature not marked as passed

description: Create a dedicated User Profile screen for managing account details and viewing stats
steps: Create ProfileScreen in expo/app/(tabs)/profile.tsx
Integrate GET /api/auth/me and PUT /api/auth/profile endpoints
Display aggregated user statistics from backend/server.ts

description: Allow users to favorite/bookmark specific workouts for quick access
steps: Create 'user_favorites' table in backend/db.sql
Add POST/DELETE /api/favorites endpoints to backend/server.ts
Add heart icon toggle to WorkoutDetails in expo/app/(tabs)/explore.tsx

description: Add an automatic rest timer that triggers between workout sets
steps: Modify ActiveWorkoutScreen in expo/app/workout/[id].tsx
Add state for 'rest' mode vs 'active' mode
Trigger countdown overlay when a set is marked as completed

description: Add search by text and filtering by difficulty to the workout explorer
steps: Update GET /api/workouts in backend/server.ts to accept search and difficulty query params
Add SearchBar and Filter chips UI to expo/app/(tabs)/explore.tsx
Update apiService.getWorkouts in expo/services/api.ts to pass new params

description: Visualize strength progress with charts showing weight lifted over time
steps: Add GET /api/stats/exercise/:id endpoint to backend/server.ts
Install react-native-chart-kit in expo/
Create ProgressionChart component in expo/components/ui

description: Cache workout categories and details for offline access
steps: Install @react-native-async-storage/async-storage in expo/
Implement caching layer in expo/services/api.ts
Modify loadHomeData in expo/app/(tabs)/index.tsx to try cache on failure
errorMessage: Agent completed but feature not marked as passed

description: Enable sharing of workout summary stats to social media platforms
steps: Install expo-sharing and expo-view-shot in expo/
Create a shareable view layout in ActiveWorkoutScreen (summary mode)
Implement capture and share logic in handleFinish function

description: Add text-to-speech audio cues for workout intervals and rest periods
steps: Install expo-speech in expo/package.json
Implement speech triggers in expo/app/workout/[id].tsx for start/stop/rest events
Add mute toggle in the active workout header

description: Allow users to track weight and BMI changes over time
steps: Create user_body_metrics table in backend/schema.ts
Add GET/POST endpoints for metrics in backend/server.ts
Add visual chart to expo/app/(tabs)/profile.tsx using react-native-chart-kit

description: Implement a permanent account deletion flow for GDPR compliance
steps: Add DELETE /api/auth/me endpoint in backend/server.ts
Add Delete Account button in expo/app/(tabs)/profile.tsx
Implement confirmation modal and redirect to login on success

description: Enable users to set and track a weekly workout frequency goal
steps: Add weekly_goal column to users table in backend/schema.ts
Update profile endpoint to support goal setting
Visualize goal vs actual progress in expo/app/(tabs)/index.tsx

description: Populate the empty admin dashboard with high-level app statistics
steps: Create /api/admin/stats endpoint in backend/server.ts for user/workout counts
Implement fetch logic in vitereact/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx
Display key metrics (Active Users, Most Popular Workout) using simple cards

description: Allow users to rate workouts after completion to help others choose
steps: Create workout_ratings table in backend/schema.ts
Add rating input to the summary view in expo/app/workout/[id].tsx
Display average rating in expo/app/(tabs)/explore.tsx

description: Admin interface to view, search, and manage registered users
steps: Create /api/admin/users endpoint in backend/server.ts
Create new page vitereact/src/pages/admin/Users.tsx
Add link to AdminLayout.tsx sidebar

description: Allow users to swap an exercise for another targeting the same muscle group
steps: Add 'Swap' button to exercise card in expo/app/workout/[id].tsx
Fetch alternative exercises from /api/exercises filtered by target_muscle_group
Update local logs state to reflect the new exercise ID

description: Notify users when they hit a new Personal Record for an exercise
steps: Enhance POST /api/workout-logs in backend/server.ts to compare against max_weight history
Return pr_achieved flag in response
Display celebration animation in expo/app/workout/[id].tsx summary

description: Allow users to schedule specific workouts for future dates
steps: Create user_schedule table in backend/schema.ts
Add calendar view to expo/app/(tabs)/index.tsx
Implement scheduled workout prompts on the dashboard

description: Add $10/month Pro subscription with premium features and payment flow
steps: Add subscription tables and fields to database schema
Create backend API endpoints for subscription management (subscribe, cancel, status)
Build subscription modal component with payment method selection
Integrate subscription status into profile screen
Display Pro badge and features for subscribed users

description: Implement an analytics dashboard showing key metrics like total users, active subscriptions, and most popular workouts
steps: Create new backend endpoint GET /api/admin/stats to aggregate counts from users, workouts, and workout_logs tables
Update vitereact/src/services/api.ts to include the new getAdminStats method
Modify vitereact/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx to fetch and display these metrics in a grid layout
Add chart visualization for workout completions over time using a library like recharts

description: Create a drag-and-drop interface within the Workout form to assign, order, and configure exercises
steps: Create backend endpoints POST/PUT /api/workouts/:id/exercises to handle batch updates of the workout_exercises join table
Update vitereact/src/pages/admin/WorkoutForm.tsx to include an 'Exercise Picker' modal
Implement a list component in the form to manage order_index, default_sets, and default_reps for selected exercises
Add validation to ensure a workout has at least one exercise before publishing

description: Develop a User Management view to list all users, search by email, and view subscription details
steps: Create backend endpoint GET /api/admin/users with pagination and search support
Create new page vitereact/src/pages/admin/Users.tsx with a data table component
Add route /admin/users to vitereact/src/App.tsx and the sidebar in AdminLayout.tsx
Implement 'View Details' modal showing user profile, stats, and is_pro status

description: Add a video preview modal to the Exercise list and form to verify video URLs
steps: Create a reusable VideoModal component in vitereact/src/components/ui/
Update vitereact/src/pages/admin/Exercises.tsx to add a 'Play' button next to video URLs
Integrate the modal into vitereact/src/pages/admin/ExerciseForm.tsx to preview the URL while editing
Handle common video embed formats (YouTube, Vimeo, direct MP4)

description: Build a transaction history view to monitor revenue and subscription events
steps: Create backend endpoint GET /api/admin/transactions querying the subscription_transactions table
Create new page vitereact/src/pages/admin/Subscriptions.tsx
Display transactions in a sortable table with status badges (pending, completed, failed)
Add filtering by status and date range

description: Enable bulk import of exercises via CSV upload to speed up content population
steps: Implement a CSV parsing utility in vitereact/src/utils/csvParser.ts
Add 'Import CSV' button to vitereact/src/pages/admin/Exercises.tsx
Create a backend endpoint POST /api/exercises/bulk for batch insertion
Add UI feedback for success/failure counts

description: Add search, category, and difficulty filters to the Admin Workouts and Exercises lists
steps: Update vitereact/src/services/api.ts to accept query parameters for getWorkouts and getExercises
Add filter inputs (search bar, dropdowns) to vitereact/src/pages/admin/Workouts.tsx
Implement debounced search to prevent excessive API calls
Refactor the backend GET /api/exercises endpoint to support filtering (similar to existing workouts endpoint)

description: Replace standard textareas with a Markdown editor for Workout and Exercise descriptions
steps: Install a lightweight markdown editor package (e.g., react-markdown-editor-lite) in vitereact
Replace the description textarea in vitereact/src/components/WorkoutForm.tsx and ExerciseForm.tsx
Sanitize input on the backend to prevent XSS
Update the frontend display components to render the Markdown content properly

description: Create a settings page to manage standardized values for 'Target Muscle Group' and 'Difficulty Level'
steps: Create a new table 'tags' or 'lookups' in backend/db.sql
Create endpoints to manage these tags
Update vitereact/src/pages/admin/ExerciseForm.tsx to use a Select dropdown populated by these tags instead of free text
Create vitereact/src/pages/admin/Settings.tsx to manage the list of available tags

description: Add a real-time activity feed to the dashboard showing recent workout completions
steps: Create backend endpoint GET /api/admin/activity fetching recent workout_logs with user details
Add an 'Activity Feed' widget to vitereact/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx
Display relative timestamps (e.g., '2 mins ago') and clickable user/workout links
Implement auto-refresh or polling every 60 seconds
